settings_schema.header: To set up the GitLab plugin, you need to register a GitLab OAuth app here https://github.com/settings/applications/new.

settings.help_text: The client ID for the OAuth app registered with GitLab.
The client secret for the OAuth app registered with GitLab.
The webhook secret set in GitLab.

settings.help_test: Select the username of the user that the plugin will post with. This can be any user, the name and icon will be overridden when posting.

settings.help_text: The AES encryption key used to encrypt stored access tokens.
(Optional) Set to lock the plugin to a single GitLab organization.
(Optional) The base URL for using the plugin with a GitLab Enterprise installation.
(Optional) The upload URL for using the plugin with a GitLab Enterprise installation.
